names: Seek Out New Life and Civilizations
It is a Good Day to Die

keywords.name: Augmented X
keywords.text: While this officer leads a test, you may replace up to X intuition (blue) dice with that many expertise (black) dice.

keywords.name: Changeling X
keywords.text: After this officer leads a test, add X peril to each opposing unit at this officer's location.

keywords.name: Glib X
keywords.text: After this officer leads a hail, if you were accommodating, add X peril to a unit of your choice at Comms range.

keywords.name: Handy X
keywords.text: While this officer leads a repair test, you may reroll up to X dice.

keywords.name: Inspiring [one or more stat icons]
keywords.text: While this officer leads a test with the specified stat, you can spend two analysis results to inspire their unit.

keywords.name: Medic X
keywords.text:
During your turn in the Ready Phase, you may test (difficulty 2) science stat + Biology.
Success: Remove up to X trauma from personnel at this location. You can choose more than one personnel (officers and/or team units), in which case you decide how to split the total of X trauma removed this way.

keywords.name: Perceptive X
keywords.text: While this officer leads a test, treat their unit's instruments power stat as increased by X.

keywords.name: Qapla'
keywords.text: After this officer leads an action that scores 1 or more victory points, you may bank up to 1 of the tokens on their card. While this officer has 1 or more victory point banked on their card, they gain the bracketed abilities, skills, or other game text in brackets. At the end of the game, unless this officer is captured, score all victory points banked on them.

keywords.name: Relentless X
keywords.text: While this officer leads an attack or a test for which the relevant skill comes from the security skill category, you can reroll up to X dice. For each die rerolled this way that results in breakthrough success, this officer�s unit sustains 1 health damage during the Post Effects step.

keywords.name: Detonation X
keywords.text: This unit detonates if it is at X" of an opposing unit before or after it moves. Then it uses its weapon profile to perform an attack against each unit at X" (both friendly and opposing).

keywords.name: Guided
keywords.text: If this unit begins its move at Sensors range of a locked opposing unit, it can move along one of its fore sides (instead of its lateral sides). A unit with this keyword shows these sides with striped lines on its unit card.

keywords.name: Inertia
keywords.text: This unit must activate to engage impulse and move during the Standby Phase if it has 1 or more endurance markers remaining. The unit must move a distance equal to its full engine power stat, if able.

keywords.name: Relay X
keywords.text: While there is a friendly unit with combined Comms range to this unit (adding both units' Comms ranges), this unit can use the friendly unit's X stat value instead of its own.

keywords.name: Blast X
keywords.text: When this unit detonates, it attacks each unit at X" with this weapon profile. If there are one or more opposing units with a friendly lock token at X", only those units are attacked.

keywords.name: Breach X
keywords.text: If the target has hull, during the resolve damage step, the defender does not stop reducing their hull value after their dial or track changes to the next hull status; its hull can be reduced up to X additional steps.

keywords.name: Lethal X
keywords.text:
During the post effects step, you may resolve the following effect:
Analysis+: If the attack hit and the defender sustained damage, for each analysis result spent, up to X, the defender must sustain 1 additional health damage.
� If the defender has a crew dial, its hull must have been reduced by the damage sustained.

keywords.name: Pierce X
keywords.text:
If the target has shields, during the determine outcome step, you may resolve the following effect:
Analysis+: For each analysis spent, the defender's shield value is reduced by 1 until the end of the action. This effect is cumulative up to X, including across additional attacks during the same action.

keywords.name: Pulse X
keywords.text: During the modify dice step, you may reroll a number of dice up to X.

keywords.name: Abundant X
keywords.text:
Each unit with no advantage at 2" gains the following action:
	Cargo Bay station - GATHER RESOURCES: Test (difficulty 3) science stat + Commerce or Fieldcraft (reroll instruments).
	Success: The unit adds 1 advantage, plus 1 per point by which it exceeded the difficulty, to a maximum of X.

keywords.name: Capacity X
keywords.text: This feature has one section, which can accommodate an unlimited number of officers and up to X ground units (per player). Units inside of the feature cannot be attacked by units outside of the feature.

keywords.name: Massive X
keywords.text:
After a space unit performs a maneuver, if it is at 2" of this feature, it must make the following test: test (difficulty X) command stat + Navigation (reroll impulse turn value ).
Success: Add 2 peril.
Breakthrough Success+: Remove 1 peril added this way per breakthrough success result.
Failure: Add 1 peril, plus 1 peril per point by which the test failed. Then an opponent may rotate the space unit up to 1 impulse turn.

keywords.name: Obscuring X
keywords.text: Each unit at 2" of this feature increases its evasion stat by X and treats its Comms and Sensors range as 2".

keywords.name: Treacherous X
keywords.text:
While a space unit performs a warp maneuver that crosses this feature, it must immediately resolve the following: test (difficulty X) ops stat + Navigation (reroll instruments).
Success: Complete the maneuver. Add 2 peril.
Breakthrough Success+: Remove 1 peril added this way per breakthrough success.
Failure: Add 1 peril, plus 1 per point by which the test failed. Then an opponent places the space unit touching the feature. Finally, the unit sustains 3 damage to its fore end.

keywords.name: Unstable X
keywords.text:
During the Hazard Phase, each unit at 2" of this feature must make the following test: test (difficulty X) ops stat + Mechanics (reroll impulse turn):
Success: Add 2 peril.
Breakthrough Success+: Remove 1 peril gained this way per breakthrough success.
Failure: Add 1 peril, plus 1 per point by which the test failed. Then if the ship has 3 or more <per>, any opponent may remove 3 peril from the ship to have it sustain 1 crew loss.

keywords.name: Empathic X
keywords.text: After this officer's unit participates in a hail, add X advantage to their unit.

keywords.name: Synthetic X
keywords.text: While this officer leads a test, during the Tester Modifies Dice step, you may spend a number of advantage tokens banked on this officer to change an equal number of analysis results ot breakthrough success results. If you do not, during the Resolve Post Outcome Effects step, you may spend a number of analysis from the roll to bank an equal number of advantage tokens on this officer. This officer can have a maximum of X advantage tokens banked on them.

officers.name: Eris
officers.subtitle: Manipulative Agent
abilities: Sow Discord: Test ops + Fieldcraft to add 1 peril to a unit at the same location. Difficulty is equal to the unit's command + highest social skill.

officers.name: Hanok
officers.subtitle: Sanctimonious Minister
abilities: After Hanok leads a hail, add advantage to his unit equal to the differenece between the highest and lowest trust token.

officers.name: Omet'iklan
officers.subtitle: Loyal First
abilities: After Omet'iklan sustains damage, you may add 1 advantage to a unit at Comms range.

officers.name: Talak'talan
officers.subtitle: Menacing Third
abilities: After Talak'talan's unit locks an opposing unit, add 1 peril to the opposing unit.

officers.name: The Female Changeling
officers.subtitle: Divine Ruler
abilities: Duplication: Choose an opposing officer at the Female Changeling's location. She becomes a copy of that officer with this action an Changeling 2.

officers.name: Weyoun 4
officers.subtitle: Unctuous Envoy
abilities: After Weyoun leads a hail, if you were accomodating, you may exchange your spent trust token with one of your unspent trust tokens.

officers.name: Benjamin Sisko
officers.subtitle: Reluctant Emissary
abilities: While another officer in the same unit leads a test, you may spend 1 advantage or commit Benjamin Sisko to add 1 intuition die.

officers.name: Geordi LaForge
officers.subtitle: Inquisitive Engineer
abilities: Engineering Station Reaction - When Geordi LaForge's unit takes an action, choose 1 of its alert stats. Treat the value of that stat as 1 higher while resolving that action.

officers.name: Jadzia Dax
officers.subtitle: Vivacious Host
abilities: While Jadzia Dax leads a test for which she has no skill levels, if her unit has no peril, she counts a having that skill at level 1.

officers.name: Jean-Luc Picard
officers.subtitle: Principled Captain
abilities: Captain's Chair Reaction - After an oppossing unit at Sensors range performs an aggressive or hostile act, increase this ship's alert status from any green alert to any yellow alert.

officers.name: Julian Bashir
officers.subtitle: Inquisitive Doctor
abilities: While another officer in the same unit leads a test, if Julian Bashir has no levels in the skill used, you may change 1 blank result to analysis.

officers.name: Kira Nerys
officers.subtitle: Bajoran Hero
abilities: After Kira Nerys leads a hail, if you were persuasive, you may inspire a unit at Comms range.

officers.name: Miles OBrien
officers.subtitle: Chief of Operations
abilities: While Miles O'Brien leads a test to transport personnel, reduce the difficulty by 2, to a minimum of 1.

officers.name: Odo
officers.subtitle: Stern Constable
abilities: Opposing teams in Odo's location increase the difficulty of all tests they make by 1.

officers.name: Worf
officers.subtitle: Son of Mogh
abilities: While Worf leads an attack, you can resolve the following during Post Outcome Effects: Analysis: Inspire Worf's unit.

officers.name: Data
officers.subtitle: Positronic Prodigy
abilities: Ready - Remove 2 advantage banked on Data to ready Data.

officers.name: Deanna Troi
officers.subtitle: Insightful Counsellor
abilities: Read Intentions: Spend 1 advantage from Deanna Troi's unit to move the influence marker once.

officers.name: William Riker
officers.subtitle: Dashing Commander
abilities: While William Riker is attached to a team or auxiliary unit, treat that unit's evasion as 1 higher.
Rousing Counsel: Ready an officer of lower rank at Comms range of William Riker's unit.

officers.name: T'Rul
officers.subtitle: Acerbic Subcommander
abilities: Engineering Station - Remodulate Cloak: If T'Rul's ship is cloaked, it decloaks and then cloaks.

officers.name: Duras
officers.subtitle: Son of Ja'rod
abilities: While Duras leads a raid or assault, during post effects, you can spend 2 analysis. If you do, choose an officer in the target unit to suffer damage equal to Duras' ranks in Fieldcraft.

officers.name: Gowron
officers.subtitle: Canny Chancellor
abilities: Qapla' [Ready - You may set 1 of your calm directives to hostile in this sequence: diplomacy, exploration, combat]
After Gowron leads a hail, if you were persuasive, you may choose a friendly officer in Gowron's unit an move all victory points banked on them to Gowron.

officers.name: Grilka
officers.subtitle: Indomitable Leader
abilities: Captain's Chair/Team Reaction - After Grilka's unit gains 1 or more peril, remove up to 3 peril it gained this way and gain 1 advantage.

officers.name: K'Ehleyr
officers.subtitle: Ambassador of Two Worlds
abilities: After K'Ehleyr leads a hail, if the trust gap was even (0, 2, or 4), you may exchange 1 of your unspent trust tokens for a spent trust token.

officers.name: Kurn
officers.subtitle: Steadfast Supporter
abilities: Each other friendly officer in the same section or team unit as Kurn gains Relentless equal to Kurn's Relentless value.
